main event: An observer reported seeing a reddish object with a weaving motion over South Hadley Falls, Massachusetts, on May 15, 1961.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 5-7 seconds, although the total observation time was 8 minutes., The object had a reddish rear., The sighting was classified as an Air-Visual observation., The potential identification of the object was an echo from a satellite, namely Echo 1., Two police officers reported seeing strange lights chased by two F-101 aircraft in the same area around the same time.
sighted object: reddish object with a weaving or rolling motion
